verses.arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Sabbaha lillahi ma fi as-samawati wa ma fi al-ardi wa huwa al-'azizu al-hakim
verses.translation: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth exalts Allah, and He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu lima taquluna ma la taf'alun
verses.translation: O you who have believed, why do you say what you do not do?

verses.arabic: كَبُرَ مَقْتًا عِندَ اللَّهِ أَن تَقُولُوا مَا لَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.transliteration: Kabura maqtan 'inda allahi an taquluna ma la taf'alun
verses.translation: It is most hateful to Allah that you say what you do not do

verses.arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ يُحِبُّ الَّذِينَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِهِ صَفًّا كَأَنَّهُم بُنْيَانٌ مَّرْصُوصٌ
verses.transliteration: Inna allaha yuhibbu alladhina yuqatiluna fi sabilihi saffan ka-annahum bunyanun marsus
verses.translation: Indeed, Allah loves those who fight in His cause in a row as though they are a [single] structure joined firmly

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوْمِهِ يَا قَوْمِ لِمَ تُؤْذُونَنِي وَقَد تَّعْلَمُونَ أَنِّي رَسُولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيْكُمْ ۚ فَلَمَّا زَاغُوا أَزَاغَ اللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمْ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الْفَاسِقِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa idh qala musa li-qawmihi ya qawmi lima tu'zunani wa qad ta'lamuna anni rasulu allahi ilaykum fa-lamma zaghaw azagha allahu qulubahum wa allahu la yahdi al-qawma al-fasiqin
verses.translation: And [mention, O Muhammad], when Moses said to his people, 'O my people, why do you harm me while you certainly know that I am the messenger of Allah to you?' And when they deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. And Allah does not guide the defiantly disobedient people

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ عِيسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ يَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ إِنِّي رَسُولُ اللَّهِ إِلَيْكُم مُّصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيَّ مِنَ التَّوْرَاةِ وَمُبَشِّرًا بِرَسُولٍ يَأْتِي مِن بَعْدِي اسْمُهُ أَحْمَدُ ۚ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُم بِالْبَيِّنَاتِ قَالُوا هَٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.transliteration: Wa idh qala 'isa ibnu maryama ya bani isra'ila inni rasulu allahi ilaykum musaddiqan lima bayna yadayya mina at-tawrati wa mubashshiran bi-rasulin ya'ti min ba'di ismuhu ahmad fa-lamma ja'ahum bi-al-bayyinati qalu hadha sihrun mubin
verses.translation: And [mention] when Jesus, the son of Mary, said, 'O Children of Israel, indeed I am the messenger of Allah to you confirming what came before me of the Torah and bringing good tidings of a messenger to come after me, whose name is Ahmad.' But when he came to them with clear evidences, they said, 'This is obvious magic'

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ افْتَرَىٰ عَلَى اللَّهِ الْكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدْعَىٰ إِلَى الْإِسْلَامِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ لَا يَهْدِي الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa man azlamu mimmani iftara 'ala allahi al-kadhiba wa huwa yud'a ila al-islami wa allahu la yahdi al-qawma az-zalimin
verses.translation: And who is more unjust than one who invents about Allah a lie while he is being invited to Islam. And Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people

verses.arabic: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُطْفِئُوا نُورَ اللَّهِ بِأَفْوَاهِهِمْ وَاللَّهُ مُتِمُّ نُورِهِ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.transliteration: Yuriduna li-yutfi'u nura allahi bi-afwahihim wa allahu mutimmu nurihi wa law kariha al-kafirun
verses.translation: They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it

verses.arabic: هُوَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلَ رَسُولَهُ بِالْهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ الْحَقِّ لِيُظْهِرَهُ عَلَى الدِّينِ كُلِّهِ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْمُشْرِكُونَ
verses.transliteration: Huwa alladhi arsala rasulahu bi-al-huda wa dini al-haqqi li-yuzhirahu 'ala ad-dini kullihi wa law kariha al-mushrikun
verses.translation: It is He who sent His Messenger with guidance and the religion of truth to manifest it over all religion, although those who associate others with Allah dislike it

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ تِجَارَةٍ تُنجِيكُم مِّنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu hal adullukum 'ala tijaratin tunjikum min 'adhabin alim
verses.translation: O you who have believed, shall I guide you to a transaction that will save you from a painful punishment?

verses.arabic: تُؤْمِنُونَ بِاللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ وَتُجَاهِدُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ بِأَمْوَالِكُمْ وَأَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.transliteration: Tu'minuna billahi wa rasulihi wa tujahiduna fi sabili allahi bi-amwalikum wa anfusikum dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum ta'lamun
verses.translation: [It is that] you believe in Allah and His Messenger and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if you should know

verses.arabic: يَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ وَيُدْخِلْكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ وَمَسَاكِنَ طَيِّبَةً فِي جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
verses.transliteration: Yaghfir lakum dhunubakum wa yudkhilkum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu wa masakina tayyibatan fi jannati 'adnin dhalika al-fawzu al-'azim
verses.translation: He will forgive for you your sins and admit you to gardens beneath which rivers flow and pleasant dwellings in gardens of perpetual residence. That is the great attainment

verses.arabic: وَأُخْرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَا ۖ نَصْرٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ وَفَتْحٌ قَرِيبٌ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.transliteration: Wa ukhra tuhibbunaha nasrun mina allahi wa fathun qaribun wa bashshiri al-mu'minin
verses.translation: And another [favor] you love: support from Allah and an imminent conquest; and give good tidings to the believers

verses.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا كُونُوا أَنصَارَ اللَّهِ كَمَا قَالَ عِيسَى ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ لِلْحَوَارِيِّينَ مَنْ أَنصَارِي إِلَى اللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ الْحَوَارِيُّونَ نَحْنُ أَنصَارُ اللَّهِ ۖ فَآمَنَت طَّائِفَةٌ مِّن بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ وَكَفَرَت طَّائِفَةٌ ۖ فَأَيَّدْنَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا عَلَىٰ عَدُوِّهِمْ فَأَصْبَحُوا ظَاهِرِينَ
verses.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alladhina amanu kunu ansara allahi kama qala 'isa ibnu maryama li-al-hawariyyina man ansari ila allahi qala al-hawariyyuna nahnu ansaru allahi fa-amanat ta'ifatun min bani isra'ila wa kafarat ta'ifatun fa-ayyadna alladhina amanu 'ala 'aduwwihim fa-asbahu zahirin
verses.translation: O you who have believed, be supporters of Allah, as when Jesus, the son of Mary, said to the disciples, 'Who are my supporters for Allah?' The disciples said, 'We are supporters of Allah.' And a faction of the Children of Israel believed and a faction disbelieved. So We supported those who believed against their enemy, and they became dominant
